ygData.subject: Re: Can ANYONE reproduce this error?
ygData.msgSnippet: All I can think of is that this may be an incompatibility between how MATLAB Cantera MEX file is compiled and how MATLAB itself is compiled.  I would recommend

All I can think of is that this may be an incompatibility between how MATLA=
B Cantera MEX 
file is compiled and how MATLAB itself is compiled.  I would=
 recommend building Cantera 
from source code using Visual C++ .NET with th=
e development version (CVS) of Cantera 
and see if this fixes the problem. =
 Or just wait a day or so until Cantera 1.7.0 is released, 
which I have ve=
rified to work with MATLAB under Windows at least on my system. 

For what =
it's worth, Python seems to be less susceptible to such errors than MATLAB.=
  

Dave
